Name: Puzzle Wishes
About the game: Puzzle Wishes is a combination of a dating sim and an actively scrolling match 3. Playing as an explorer looking for a place to settle down, you come across a magic lamp on your way to a kingdom. In it is a centuries-old genie who grants you a wish to find your soul mate. It turns out that you don't have a soul mate... you have seven! Features: • Seven girls to romance • Talk to girls, increase elemental affinity (powers up puzzle pieces) and go on 'puzzle' dates with them • Fantasy environment • 49 stages to beat, 7 for each girl • Partial voice acting for all heroines (by Caitlynn French, Kathy Pfautsch, Bindy Coda and Kaila Nicole) • Swimsuit CG for each heroine!
Meta Title: Puzzle Wishes: Jan 25, 2017, RhinoGearz and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Puzzle Wishes? Check out the release date (Jan 25, 2017), developer insights from RhinoGearz, and a complete game summary.
